segments.text: Wow ! You look like a drowned rat ! Didn't you know there is a thunder-storm today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I knew there would be a shower , but I didn't realize it would rain cats and dogs today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . You'd better take a hot shower right now , or you will catch a cold .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I don't want to get sick , especially during finals week .
segments.speaker: S2
